results.name: Triangle read by rows, A007318 * ((A158300 * 0^(n-k)).
formula: Triangle read by rows, A007318 * ((A158300 * 0^(n-k)). Equals binomial transform of an infinite lower triangular matrix with A158300: (1, 2, 2, 8, 8, 32, 32,...) as the main diagonal and the rest zeros.
